name: Ampharos

passive.name: Lightningrod
passive.effect: When you would discard a Lightning Energy from any attack (except by Ampharos's Discharge), you may move it instead. All moved Energies must go to Ampharos.

attacks.name: Discharge
attacks.effect: Discard 3 Lightning Energies from Ampharos. Deal 30 damage for each Energy discarded this way.

flavor: Because of the electrical output of this Pokemon, it frequently works at lighthouses to help bring in ships safely.
